title: contact
description: The 'contact' information data type captures general contact information and uses the JSON object type [RFC8259] for serialization.

email.description:
An email address for this contact. 

The key for each entry in the dictionary MUST be a 'string' that uniquely identifies the contact type (e.g., the keys could be things like 'work', 'home', 'personal', etc). The value for each key MUST be a 'string'.

phone.description:
A phone number for this contact. 

The key for each entry in the dictionary MUST be a 'string' that uniquely identifies the type (e.g., the keys could be things like 'work', 'home', 'personal', etc). The value for each key MUST be a 'string'.
